full_summary:
### Managed Web Service (MWS) Renewal Invitation

**Tender Reference:** WS4476729479
**Tender Title:** Managed Web Service (MWS) Renewal Invitation
**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

We are issuing a Request for Information (RFI) for the Managed Web Service (MWS) Renewal. The end user entities for this RFI are the Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC).

**Tender Details:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** 23:00 (14:00 EST) on 2024-04-26
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-04-03

**Supply/Special Service Details:**

* **Category of Goods/Service:** Cloud-based software as a service, platform software as a service
* **UNSPSC Codes:**
	+ 81162000 (Cloud-based software as a service)
	+ 81162103 (Platform software as a service)

**Trade Agreements:**

* The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (CWTPCA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
None.

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Canada-wide

**Additional Information:**

* The contracting entity acknowledges that the end user entities have entered into the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* Suppliers from Canada, the EU, and partner countries are eligible to participate in this tender.

To submit a proposal, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19022872

### Contact Information:

* CONTACT: Bronwyn Knight, PSPC/SPAC, Email: [bronwyn.k
